    LVMH Perfumes & Cosmetics (M) Sdn Bhd Vacancies Training & Admin Assistant (Contract)

    December 2, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    LVMH Perfumes & Cosmetics (M) Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Training & Admin Assistant (Contract) position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    As a Training and Admin Assistant, you will be playing an important role to provide strong support to the Training Department, performing administrative & coordination tasks relating to Beauty Consultants training and assisting with the general office administrative duties.

    Job Description:

    Handling documentation, inventory & coordination for Training Department:

    ·      Handling administrative tasks for training department.

    ·      Organizing, arranging and coordinating meetings and travel arrangement. 

    ·      Prepare reports and conduct research for training.

    ·      Create presentations and videos.

    ·      Coordinate uniforms arrangement for Beauty Consultants.

    Office administrative duties:

    ·      Coordinate general office administrative tasks

    ·      Maintain and order office supplies

    ·      Manage communications including phone calls and e-mails.

    Job Requirements:

    ·      Proficient in Microsoft Office (Powerpoint, Excel, Word, Outlook)

    ·      Multi-lingual preferred

    ·      Good interpersonal skills

    ·      Digital savvy (Eg. edit photos & videos)

    ·      Good time management skills, ability to multi-task

    ·      Have a good adaptability & a team player

    ·      Fresh graduates are encouraged to apply

    Company Overview

    A world leader in luxury, LVMH Moët Hennessy - Louis Vuitton possesses a unique portfolio of over 60 prestigious brands. The Group is active in five different sectors:
    ►Wines & Spirits
    ►Fashion & Leather Goods
    ►Perfumes & Cosmetics
    ►Watches & Jewelry
    ►Selective retailing
    Thanks to its brand development strategy, and the expansion of its international retail network (more than 3,000 stores worldwide), LVMH has had a strong growth dynamic since its creation in 1987.
    Today, almost 100,000 employees, 79% of whom are based outside France, share the Group's values. Besides its community action for human development - for example LVMH House and the LVMH-ESSEC Chair - LVMH carries out a number of initiatives through its commitment to protecting the environment. Faithful to its vocation as a patron, the Group is also involved in culture and heritage, humanitarian action, education and supporting young artists and designers.
     

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Kuala Lumpur.
    Apply Online
